# Song of Festering Death (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** Concentration

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)­, pg. 104

The caster sings a wailing ululation, requiring a successful [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] (singing) check (DC 20). If the Perform check succeeds and the target fails a Fortitude saving throw, the subject’s flesh bubbles and festers into pestilent blobs, dealing the subject 2d6 points of damage each round. If the subject dies, she bursts with a sickening pop as steamy gore spills onto the ground.
